query:
SELECT 
  p.id, 
  p.vendaId, 
  p.tipo, 
  p.valor, 
  p.valorLiquido, 
  p.bandeira, 
  p.parcelas, 
  p.cvNsu,
  v.dataVenda,
  v.formandoId
FROM pagamentos p
INNER JOIN vendas v ON v.id = p.vendaId
WHERE p.cvNsu = '18913508'
LIMIT 5;
command:

  v.dataVenda,
  v.formandoId
FROM pagamentos p
INNER JOIN vendas v ON v.id = p.vendaId
